references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing the communication-efficient learning methods that are central to the paper's focus.

references.paper_title: Analyzing federated learning through an adversarial lens
references.reason: This paper provides a critical analysis of adversarial attacks in federated learning, which is the primary security concern addressed in the current research.

references.paper_title: Local model poisoning attacks to byzantine-robust federated learning
references.reason: This paper introduces model poisoning attacks specifically tailored to federated learning, which are directly relevant to the paper's investigation of robust defense mechanisms.

references.paper_title: Learning to attack federated learning: A model-based reinforcement learning attack framework
references.reason: This paper presents advanced adaptive attack strategies using reinforcement learning that directly motivated the design of the robust defense mechanism discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the core concept of model-agnostic meta-learning, which is the foundation for the meta-learning approach used in the current paper to develop adaptive defenses.
